name: Create a Stripe payment intent from a Gravity Forms form submission
description:
Use this template to automatically create a Stripe payment intent when a new Gravity Forms form is submitted.

Your Gravity Forms form has to include an 'Email' and an 'Amount' fields. If you collect payments in different currencies, you also need a 'Currency' field - to be filled out with the three-letter [ISO currency code](https://www.iban.com/currency-codes).
